entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`href` TEXT NOT NULL, `description` TEXT, `extended` TEXT, `hash` TEXT NOT NULL, `time` TEXT NOT NULL, `shared` TEXT NOT NULL, `toread` TEXT NOT NULL, `tags` TEXT NOT NULL, `pendingSync` TEXT, PRIMARY KEY(`hash`))

indices.name: index_Posts_shared
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_Posts_shared` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`shared`)

indices.name: index_Posts_toread
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_Posts_toread` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`toread`)

entities.createSql: CREATE VIRTUAL TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` USING FTS4(`href` TEXT NOT NULL, `description` TEXT, `extended` TEXT, `tags` TEXT NOT NULL, tokenize=unicode61 `tokenchars=._-=#@&`, content=`Posts`)
contentSyncTriggers: CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_PostsFts_BEFORE_UPDATE BEFORE UPDATE ON `Posts` BEGIN DELETE FROM `PostsFts` WHERE `docid`=OLD.`rowid`; END
CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_PostsFts_BEFORE_DELETE BEFORE DELETE ON `Posts` BEGIN DELETE FROM `PostsFts` WHERE `docid`=OLD.`rowid`; END

CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_PostsFts_AFTER_UPDATE AFTER UPDATE ON `Posts` BEGIN INSERT INTO `PostsFts`(`docid`, `href`, `description`, `extended`, `tags`) VALUES (NEW.`rowid`, NEW.`href`, NEW.`description`, NEW.`extended`, NEW.`tags`); END

CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_PostsFts_AFTER_INSERT AFTER INSERT ON `Posts` BEGIN INSERT INTO `PostsFts`(`docid`, `href`, `description`, `extended`, `tags`) VALUES (NEW.`rowid`, NEW.`href`, NEW.`description`, NEW.`extended`, NEW.`tags`); END

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`term` TEXT NOT NULL, `tags` TEXT NOT NULL, `matchAll` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 1, `exactMatch` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, PRIMARY KEY(`term`, `tags`, `matchAll`, `exactMatch`))

setupQueries: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS room_master_table (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,identity_hash TEXT)
INSERT OR REPLACE INTO room_master_table (id,identity_hash) VALUES(42, '13d58a7fb32639deb724e92988ab1aa9')
